    Class
    Description
    private static final record 
    MaterialRules.ConditionalBlockStateRule
    Applies another block state rule if the given predicate matches, and returns null otherwise.
    private static final record 
    MaterialRules.SequenceBlockStateRule
    Applies the given block state rules in sequence, and returns the first result that isn't null.
    private static final record 
    MaterialRules.SimpleBlockStateRule
    Always returns the given BlockState.
